Reviews.Title: “Great location”

Reviews.Title: “Would not go there again!”
Reviews.Author: ebbe1983
Reviews.Content: location 3 mins walking square bad short vaporetto stops hotel wandering sign handwritten wall saying name hotel arrow alley yellow walls dirty contribution killed 50 mosquitos stay blood tv breakfast sick cheese salami juice price dont pricy location 780 euros 4 nights worth maybe lower seasons anyway recommend sick food spray bugspray twice day boyfriend bitten approx 20 times look week

Reviews.Title: “great location”
Reviews.Author: ASTRA5
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel tiepolo 4 nights location 5 mins st marks square 5 mins san zaccaria vaporetto stop positives hotel clean cleaned daily safe staff helpful time help negatives space clothes hairdryer hose broken air broken hose mini fridge didnt breakfast ok basic tinned fruit cornflakes juices hotels venice expensive value stay

Reviews.Title: “Perfect!”
Reviews.Author: catcat42
Reviews.Content: spent 2 nights hotel center venice canal spacy clean nice nice bathroom staff ok breakfast nice beautiful view canal cheap location return time
